info.comment:
-=WARNING=-
This does have some cartoonish blood in it, so don't view unless you can handle this stuff. If you aren't sure, ask a parent or guardian before doing so.

-=Main Menu=-
Here, you set up your game. Choose from 3 mode; Survival, Time Attack and Challange mode. Next choose 1 of 3 locations from Planet Green. You can also turn the music on and off.

-=Story=-
Radar's planet is turned upside down when zombies start to appear on his planet. It's up to him so save his planet.

-=About=-
This is basicly a "Red Dawn 2" mod. It features new music, a new menu. new locations and obviously, you play as Radar now.

-=Controls=-
WASD or Arrow Keys: Move Player
Space: Reload Gun
Mouse: Shoot/Aim

Yep, support for lefties.
info.author: 08jackt
